name: comment_processing_workflow
description: Workflow for processing a comment entity by setting a createdAt timestamp if missing

transitions.name: set_createdAt_transition
transitions.description: Add createdAt timestamp to the entity if it is missing
transitions.end_state_description: Entity now has a createdAt timestamp

externalized_processors.name: process_set_createdAt
externalized_processors.description: Ensures the createdAt attribute is set on the entity
